thread.title: WWE's Chris Jericho trolls Tom Brady on Raw
thread.title_full: WWE's Chris Jericho trolls Tom Brady on Raw

title: WWE's Chris Jericho trolls Tom Brady on Raw
text:
Feb 6, 2017 at 9:24p ET 0Shares 
WWE legend Chris Jericho is a man of many nicknames, from Y2J to Lionheart to the Ayatollah of Rock and Rolla . Jericho regularly calls himself the best in the world at what he does, and he even has the acronym “G.O.A.T.” emblazoned on the back of his wrestling trunks. Via WWE.com 
On Monday’s episode of Raw, Jericho was upset that so many fans and analysts have been praising Patriots quarterback Tom Brady as the greatest athlete to ever live after his miraculous comeback in Super Bowl LI – so he added Brady to the List of Jericho. 
Goldberg interrupted Jericho and Owens as they were discussing a potential WrestleMania main event between best friends, and after suggesting that he face Owens at Fastlane next month for the Universal Championship, he put himself on Jericho’s list.
